title: Indian YouTuber Armaan Malik aka Sandeep Jhangra accused for Sexual abuse.
selftext: There is more to this news. Not only Armaan but even his wives are accused for abusing and manhandling their staff and househelp. He still has millions of dollars and needs to be cancelled.
comments: We need to spread awareness about him so that viewers stop consuming his content.
